sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Parse AI Agent's Client Assets into a usable array of product objects.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Converts the raw JSON string returned by the AI Agent into a structured object with a 'products' array that includes each product's number and description.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Parse Client's Assets JSON
